info.title: U.S. Bank Treasury Management
info.description: U.S. Bank Treasury Management Solution including Corporate Account Information and Real-Time Payment

post.summary: Initiate an RTP credit transfer Transaction
post.description: Allows for applications to initiate an RTP credit transfer. The payer in the credit transfer should be a US Bank customer.

version.description: API version code made up of major.minor.patch version information (ex: 1.0.0)

Correlation-ID.description: Unique identifier for every request response pair

Location.description: Link to the location that can be used to retrieve status updates for the transaction

transactionID.description: Unique identifier assigned by US Bank. This id can be used to retrieve the transaction later

clientRequestID.description: Unique identifier defined by the client application for every Credit transfer/ RFP

get.summary: Retrieve status and details of a RTP credit transfer Transaction sent
get.description: Allows for applications to retrieve the status and details of  an RTP credit transfer that was initiated or an incoming credit transfer.

parameters.name: transactionID
parameters.description: Transaction ID associated with the transactions being retrieved.

Version.description: API version code made up of major.minor.patch version

Correlation-ID.description: Unique identifier for every request response pair

post.summary: Initiate an RTP request for payment (RFP)
post.description: Allows for applications to initiate an RTP request for payment for receiving money in your US Bank account.

version.description: API version code made up of major.minor.patch version information (ex: 1.0.0)

Correlation-ID.description: Unique identifier for every request response pair

Location.description: Link to the location that can be used to retrieve status updates for the transaction

transactionID.description: Unique identifier assigned by US Bank. This id can be used to retrieve the transaction later

clientRequestID.description: Unique identifier defined by the client application for every Credit transfer/ RFP

get.summary: Retrieve status and details of an RFP sent
get.description: Allows for applications to retrieve the status and details of  an RTP RFP that was initiated.

parameters.name: transactionID
parameters.description: Transaction ID associated with the transactions being retrieved.

Version.description: API version code made up of major.minor.patch version

Correlation-ID.description: Unique identifier for every request response pair

get.summary: Check if receiver's bank is part of the RTP Network
get.description: Check if the recipient's bank is part of the RTP Network. Routing number of the receiving bank is required to check RTP eligibility.

parameters.name: routingNumber
parameters.description: 9 digit routing number of the receiver's bank

Version.description: API version code made up of major.minor.patch version

Correlation-ID.description: Unique identifier for every request response pair

get.summary: Get list of accounts for the authorized customer
get.description: Get list of accounts for the authorized customer.

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: Current Page Number from query result to return

Version.description: API version code made up of major.minor.patch version

Correlation-ID.description: Unique identifier for every request response pair

post.description: Get account balances for an array of accounts for current-day.

pageNumber.description: Current Page Number from query result to return

Version.description: API version code made up of major.minor.patch version

get.summary: Get transactions of an account for prior business days over a date range
get.description: Get transactions of an account for prior business days over a date range.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Start date/time to retrieve transactions. ISO 8601.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: End date/time to retrieve transactions.  ISO 8601.

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: Current Page Number from query result to return

Version.description: API version code made up of major.minor.patch version

Correlation-ID.description: Unique identifier for every request response pair

Content-Type.name: Content-Type
Content-Type.description: Indicates the media-type of the resource.

Client-ID.name: Client-ID
Client-ID.description: OAuth Client ID. The API key.

Correlation-ID.description: Unique identifier for every request response pair

On-Behalf-Of.x-ms-summary: U.S. Bank customer ID this request is for
On-Behalf-Of.name: On-Behalf-Of
On-Behalf-Of.description: The U.S. Bank customer ID if the API request is submitted by a service provider on behalf of the customer. This field is conditionally required.

addressLine1.description: Main address of the recipient. Include house number, street name, apartment number etc.

addressLine2.description: Main address of the recipient. Include house number, street name, apartment number etc.

country.description: Recipient's resident country. Only allowed value is US.

clientRequestID.description: Unique identifier defined by the client application for every Credit transfer/ RFP

UltimatePayer.description: Ultimate payer details incase payer is intermediary. Should only be used for 'INTERMEDIARY' paymentType

UltimatePayee.description: Ultimate payee details incase payee is intermediary. Should only be used for 'INTERMEDIARY' paymentType

payerDetails.description: Details of the US bank customer whose account will be debited

name.description: name of the US bank customer who's account will be debited

routingNumber.format: Routing number should pass the check digit validation

name.description: name of the payee who's account will be credited

routingNumber.description: routing number of the receiving bank
routingNumber.format: Routing number should pass the check digit validation

amount.description: Amount to be transferred. The amount should be formatted with 2 decimal places

paymentType.description: Type of RTP payment that will allow the sending and receiving bank to process the payment appropriately

remittanceID.description: Remittance Identification from remt.001 to identify the separate remittance advice sent by the Debtor that is associated with the Credit Transfer

remittanceLocationDetails.description: The email address or URI where the remittance info was sent

email.description: Email address where the remittance info was sent

URI.description: URI where the remittance info was sent

additionalInfo.description: Used to provide additional remittance related information

payeeDetails.description: Details of the US bank customer whose requesting the payment. The payee

routingNumber.format: Routing number should pass the check digit validation

name.description: name of the payer to whom the RFP is being sent

routingNumber.description: routing number of the receiving bank
routingNumber.format: Routing number should pass the check digit validation

amount.description: Amount to be transferred. The amount should be formatted with 2 decimal places

paymentType.description: Type of RTP payment that will allow the sending and receiving bank to process the payment appropriately

requestedExecutionDateTime.description: Date or Date & time on which the payment is to be executed. Date & time should be provided Eastern Time. If only date is provided, then it is assumed that the payment is to be done by EOD calendar day, ET

expiryDateTime.description: Date or date and time, after which, the debtor isn't allowed to initiate a CT in response to this request. Date & time should be provided as per Eastern Time. Date cant be before execution date

paymentModificationAllowed.description: Indicates if an amount other than the requested amount can be paid or not

remittanceID.description: Remittance Identification from remt.001 to identify the separate remittance advice sent by the Debtor that is associated with the Credit Transfer

remittanceLocationDetails.description: The email address or URI where the remittance info was sent

email.description: Email address where the remittance info was sent

URI.description: URI where the remittance info was sent

additionalInfo.description: Used to provide additional remittance related information

fullAmount.description: Amount before the discount is applied.This field is used to indicate total due amount for bill pay related RFPs

discountedAmount.description: Amount after the discount is applied.This field is used to indicate minimum due amount for bill pay related RFPs

code.description:
Long term persistent identifier which can be used to trace error condition back to log information. 
  format: AAA.BBBB.CCCC 
    * AAA = 3-Digit HTTP Status Code
    * BBBB = 4-Digit Apigee Proxy API ID. Assigned by EASE. 
    * CCCC = 4-Digit Error Reason Code. Assigned by LOB API Development Team
    Codes returned externally may differ from the codes produced within US Bank by internal facing API.

message.description: End user displayable information, this is the human readable text that provides a high level categorization of the error that has occurred

help.description: Hyperlink(s) to supporting API documentation and US Bank support contacts

details.description: An array of detail objects containing the specific information around why the error occurred.  Detail objects must contain attributeName AND reason

attributeName.description: Field that caused the caught error.  Used in occurrences caused by validation errors

reason.description: Description of why the field caused an error. Used in occurrences caused by validation errors.

transactionID.description: Transaction ID of the credit transfer transaction

originalRFPTransactionID.description: Transaction ID of the original RFP incase the credit transfer is in response to an RFP

transactionType.description: Whether the transaction is an inbound or an outbound transaction

message.description: Additional details of the transaction status

accountNumber.description: Last 4 digits of Payer account number that was used for making the payment.
Last 4 digits of the Account number of the payee

routingNumber.description: Routing number of the payee bank

remittanceID.description: Remittance Identification from remt.001 to identify the separate remittance advice sent by the Debtor that is associated with the Credit Transfer

remittanceLocationDetails.description: The email address or URI where the remittance info was sent

email.description: Email address where the remittance info was sent

URI.description: URI where the remittance info was sent

additionalInfo.description: Used to provide additional remittance related information

transactionType.description: Whether the transaction is an inbound or an outbound transaction

message.example: Received and transmitted to receiving bank successfully.

payeeDetails.description: Details of the entity whose requesting the payment. The payee

routingNumber.description: routing number of the sending bank

name.description: name of the payer to whom the RFP is being sent

routingNumber.description: routing number of the receiving bank

transactionID.description: Transaction id assigned by US Bank.

amount.description: Amount to be transferred. The amount should be formatted with 2 decimal places

paymentType.description: Type of RTP payment that will allow the sending and receiving bank to process the payment appropriately

requestedExecutionDateTime.description: Date or Date & time on which the payment is to be executed. If only date is provided, then it is assumed that the payment is to be done by EOD calendar day, ET

expiryDateTime.description: Date or date and time, after which, the debtor isn't allowed to initiate a CT in response to this request. Date cant be before execution date

paymentModificationAllowed.description: Indicates if an amount other than the requested amount can be paid or not

remittanceID.description: Remittance Identification from remt.001 to identify the separate remittance advice sent by the Debtor that is associated with the Credit Transfer

remittanceLocationDetails.description: The email address or URI where the remittance info was sent

email.description: Email address where the remittance info was sent

URI.description: URI where the remittance info was sent

additionalInfo.description: Used to provide additional remittance related information

fullAmount.description: Amount before the discount is applied.This field is used to indicate total due amount for bill pay related RFPs

discountedAmount.description: Amount after the discount is applied.This field is used to indicate minimum due amount for bill pay related RFPs

responseCode.description:
Captures the type of response.
Scheduled - RFP scheduled for a future date
Reject - RFP will not be paid.

creditTransfertransactionIDs.description: Transaction IDs of the credit transfer(s) in case any credit transfers were sent in response to RFP

rejectReason.description: Reject reason incase a rejection was sent by the receiver
rejectReason.example: Amount received is not the amount agreed or expected

additionalInformation.description: Additional Information on the reject reason

scheduledPaymentDetails.description: Details of the scheduled payment in case a payment is scheduled

amountAccepted.description: Amount accepted if payment modification is allowed in original RFP

earlyPaymentIndicator.description: Indicates if the debtor agrees to pay on or before the requested date or not

scheduledDateTime.description: The date or date and time on which the payment is scheduled

RTPEligibilityResponse.description: Provides RTP eligibility information for a routing number

rtpEligible.description: Indicates if the routing number provided is part of the RTP network

AccountDescriptor.description: Light weight summary of the account

accountNumber.description: Account Number of the authorized customer

routingNumber.description: Routing Number of the authorized customer

currency.description: ISO currency code of the transaction or balance

PageMeta.description: To minimize response times for requests and generally improve the end-user experience

pageCount.description: Total number of pages in the result set

AccountsInquiry.description: **1. Either accountID(s) or accountDetails can be provided for account balances.** </br> **2. When both accountID and accountDetails objects are provided, accountID object will be defaulted and respective results are returned.**

AccountDetails.description: Additional account's filter parameters for retrieving balances

accountNumber.description: Account Number of the authorized customer

routingNumber.description: Routing Number of the authorized customer

Warnings.description: A warning entity which can be used at the API level for successful responses.

code.description: Long term persistent identifier which can be used to trace warning condition back to log information

message.description: End user displayable information, this is the human readable text that provides a high level categorization of the warning that has occurred
message.example: Some accounts provided in the accountID parameter are invalid or not entitled.

AccountSummaryCurrentDay.description: Account Details Extends and inherits all fields from AccountDescriptor.

openingLedger.description: Optional previous day opening ledger balance that can be enabled at account level.

interimLedger.description: Equal to the Opening Ledger Balance plus current day credits, minus current day debits.

collectedPlusOneDay.description: The opening collected balance plus the previous day one day float

interimCollected.description: 1. Equal to the Opening Collected Balance, plus current day credits, minus current day debits and all interim 1, 2 and 3-day float 2. Note- that ATM, phone and branch memo credits are not included in the Interim Collected Balance.

oneDayFloat.description: Amount of the transaction that will be available in one business day

twoDayFloat.description: Amount of the transaction that will be available in two business days

threeDayPlusFloat.description: Amount of the transaction that will be available in three or more business days

CDPresentmentTotal.description: The Controlled Disbursement presentment totals (also known as Net Funding Total) after the final presentment is available if this is a Controlled Disbursement account.

totalCredits.description: Sum of  previous day detail credits (BAI record type 16's)

numberOfCredits.description: Item count of all current day credits

totalDebits.description: Sum of all previous day detail debits(BAI record type 16's)

numberOfDebits.description: Item count of all current day debits

accessibleBalance.description: Real time available balance plus any related Zero balance account balances plus overdraft credit amount. This balance is only available if the account is entitled.

balanceAsOfDate.description: ISO 8601 format of the date that the data is from (when it was retrieved)

AccountSummaryPreviousDay.description: Account Details Extends and inherits all fields from AccountDescriptor.

ledgerBalance.description: The Ledger Balance is the closing balance from previous day processing, also equal to opening ledger balance for current day.

collectedPlusOneDay.description: The Opening Available Balance is equal to the Collected Balance plus the 1 day float amount.

openingCollected.description: Funds without any float assigned as of the end of the day

oneDayFloat.description: Amount of the transaction that will be available in one business day

twoDayFloat.description: Amount of the transaction that will be available in two business days

threeDayPlusFloat.description: Amount of the transaction that will be available in three or more business days

MTDAverageCollected.description: The amount of funds collected each day without float, divided by the number of business days in that month

MTDAverageNegativeCollected.description: The amount of funds negative collected each day without float, divided by the number of business days in that month

totalCredits.description: Sum of  previous day detail credits (BAI record type 16's)

numberOfCredits.description: Item count of all previous day credits

totalDebits.description: Sum of all previous day detail debits(BAI record type 16's)

numberOfDebits.description: Item count of all previous day debits

accessibleBalance.description: Available balance plus any related Zero balance account balances plus overdraft credit amount. This balance a static balance as of the time of previous day processing, and is only available if the account is entitled.

Checks.description: The availability of the fields in the below object is dependent on type of transaction.

lastRefreshedDateTime.description: ISO 8601 Date format that the data is from.

ACH.description: The availability of the fields in the below object is dependent on type of transaction.

effectiveEntryDate.description: Effective entry date of the transaction

RTP.description: The availability of the fields in the below object is dependent on type of transaction.

debtorName.example: WESTERN GLAZIERS RETIREMENT PLANDEP OSIT ACCOUNT

Zelle.description: The availability of the fields in the below object is dependent on type of transaction.

Wires.description: The availability of the fields in the below object is dependent on type of transaction.

originator.example: XYZCO OP ACCT 1234 12345 APPLE RD CITY UNITED STATES STATE

beneficiary.example: 123412341234 SAMPLECO 54321 ORANGE DR CITY UNITED STATES STATE

BAICode.description: Bank Administration Institute code of the transaction

transactionReferenceNumber.description: This attribute is a customer provided ID for each transaction. It may or may not be echoed back depending on whether it is provided by the customer or mapped by the our system.

bankReferenceNumber.description: This attribute is a bank system generated unique transaction ID for each transaction. It refer's to the following types of transactions </br> 1. For RTP transactions, bankReferenceNumber is the unique transaction identifier </br> 2. For BookTransfers transaction, bankReferenceNumber is the unique transaction identifier </br> 3. For checkDeposits/CheckPaid/Cont Disb Checks/Outgoing cash Letter, bankReferenceNumber is the unique transaction identifier.  </br> 4. For ACH transactions, bankReferenceNumber refers to the PAR Number provided by the ACH network </br> 5. For Zelle transactions, bankReferenceNumber refers to the  paymentInstructionID </br> 6. For wire transactions, bankReferenceNumber refers to the PAR Number provided by the fed/swift network

currency.description: ISO currency code of the transaction or balance
